prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with a sleek, elongated body and a bright aura.
I want a water-type Pokemon that resembles a small fish, with shimmering scales and a playful demeanor.
Generate a unique Pokemon that embodies the essence of electricity and aquatic environments.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a tiny aquatic creature, with vibrant colors and a friendly expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in the sea, characterized by its smooth body and electric abilities.
Design a small, fish-like Pokemon that emits sparks of electricity when excited or threatened.
Show me a playful electric Pokemon that can swim swiftly through water and has a bright appearance.
